name: housewifely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like or typical of a housewife (= a woman whose work is inside the home, doing the cleaning, cooking, etc.): She had taken on the role of housewifely caretaker. At four o'clock every day she did a housewifely tidying up. See
housewife
More examplesFewer examplesIn a housewifely kind of way, he went to the kitchen and returned with a plate of sandwiches. She seemed obsessed with her housewifely duties, wiping and dusting everything in sight.The fact is that some housewifely talents are more useful than others.
